text: It almost feels worse that I don t have a  reason  to feel suicidalI m in college  I work  I have friends  family  and a girlfriend  There should be no reason I want to die but Jesus Christ it s all I can think about sometimes   I obsess over my past and I know it s just my brain doing it to me but I feel like a fucking terrible person and waste and a drain on the people around me The fact that there s no external cause for this feeling makes me feel so much more helpless   I went a long time thinking everyone went through periods where they think about killing themselves   One time a close friend confided in me after the death of someone we knew that for the first time in his life he thought about  what it would be like without me  the friend  around  And then it hit me that it isn t normal to think this way all the fucking time   Ugh  I just wish I would be happy and not want to be dead
summary: There is no external cause for feeling suicidal. My friend confided in me that after the death of someone he knew, he thought about what it would be like without his friend around. I wish I would be happy and not want to be dead.
